Text: TIRR Foundations I Believe I Can Fly Galaa quick note of appreciation for your help in arranging for Enron to donate to the captioned event TIRR is a great organization working for a great cause and we really appreciate Enrons support Evans

Leaving EnronJeff Having been here at EES for not quite two years Ive come to the realization that Enron doesnt seem to be the right place for me As a result I will be leaving EES effective the end of the month I have enjoyed the Enron experience but as Andy counseled me when I joined Enron isnt right for everyone and I think that applies to me at this point of my career Ive decided to return to my banking roots and am mounting a job search in the Houston banking community With a little luck I will find an opportunity to cover the Enron account where I can leverage off my time here Finally I want to thank you personally for the opportunity that I had here I wish you all the best as you and your team tackle the challenges facing Enron See you soon Evans

TIRR Foundations I Believe I Can Fly Galaa quick note of appreciation for your help in arranging for Enron to donate to the captioned event TIRR is a great organization working for a great cause and we really appreciate Enrons support Evans
